name: Spot the difference (itch) (Harsh Bishnoi)
description:
Game Description

Each level contain 2 identical pictures with some differences between them, find those differences to complete a level.

This is a 5 differences game, but some levels have even more hidden differences to spot!

Features that make our "Spot the difference" game best :-
• Find the difference on High Quality photos and objects.
• Unlimited hints! Useful to find the last hidden objects.
• Progression on both easy and hard levels - some are harder than you think.
